headline.print_headline: Official: 3 Killed in Failed Afghan Prison Break
headline.main: Official: 3 Killed in Failed Afghan Prison Break

docs.snippet: Two prisoners and a child were killed Sunday during an attempted prison break in southern Afghanistan, a top police official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two prisoners and a child were killed Sunday during an attempted prison break in southern Afghanistan, a top police official said.

headline.print_headline: Farmers' Almanac Predicts Another Nasty Winter
headline.main: Farmers' Almanac Predicts Another Nasty Winter

docs.snippet: The folks at the Farmers' Almanac can be forgiven for feeling smug: The 198-year-old publication correctly predicted the past nasty winter while federal forecasters blew it....
docs.lead_paragraph: The folks at the Farmers' Almanac can be forgiven for feeling smug: The 198-year-old publication correctly predicted the past nasty winter while federal forecasters blew it.

headline.sub: Netanyahu warns Gazans after Israel destroys 13-story building
headline.main: Netanyahu warns Gazans after Israel destroys 13-story building

docs.snippet: A massive Israeli airstrike flattens a 13-story apartment block, taking the war in Gaza to a new level, as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu warns Palestinian civilians to leave any site where militants are operating. Mana Rabiee reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A massive Israeli airstrike flattens a 13-story apartment block, taking the war in Gaza to a new level, as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu warns Palestinian civilians to leave any site where militants are operating. Mana Rabiee reports.

headline.print_headline: Ambassador: UK Close to Identifying Foley Killer
headline.main: Ambassador: UK Close to Identifying Foley Killer

docs.snippet: Police and spy agencies are close to identifying the English-accented militant depicted on video showing the killing of U.S. journalist James Foley, Britain's ambassador to the United States said Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police and spy agencies are close to identifying the English-accented militant depicted on video showing the killing of U.S. journalist James Foley, Britain's ambassador to the United States said Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Donaldson Secures Ryder Cup Place With Czech Victory
headline.main: Donaldson Secures Ryder Cup Place With Czech Victory

docs.snippet: Jamie Donaldson secured his place in Europe's team for next month's Ryder Cup at Gleneagles with a storming final round to win the Czech Masters at the Albatross Golf Resort by two shots on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jamie Donaldson secured his place in Europe's team for next month's Ryder Cup at Gleneagles with a storming final round to win the Czech Masters at the Albatross Golf Resort by two shots on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Lyles Gives U.S. Track and Field Win at Youth Olympics
headline.main: Lyles Gives U.S. Track and Field Win at Youth Olympics

docs.snippet: American teenager Noah Lyles stormed to victory in the men's 200 meters sprint on Sunday to provide the United States with their first gold medal in track and field at the Youth Olympics in Nanjing, China....
docs.lead_paragraph: American teenager Noah Lyles stormed to victory in the men's 200 meters sprint on Sunday to provide the United States with their first gold medal in track and field at the Youth Olympics in Nanjing, China.

headline.print_headline: German Car Parts Suppliers Asked to Form JVs in China-Stuttgarter Zeitung
headline.main: German Car Parts Suppliers Asked to Form JVs in China-Stuttgarter Zeitung

docs.snippet: Three German car parts suppliers have been told by China they can no longer manage their Chinese units independently but need to form partnerships with local peers, the chief executive of auto parts maker ElringKlinger told a German paper....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three German car parts suppliers have been told by China they can no longer manage their Chinese units independently but need to form partnerships with local peers, the chief executive of auto parts maker ElringKlinger told a German paper.

headline.print_headline: Donaldson Wins Czech Masters, Makes Ryder Cup
headline.main: Donaldson Wins Czech Masters, Makes Ryder Cup

docs.snippet: Jamie Donaldson shot 4-under 68 Sunday to win the Czech Masters and secure a spot on the European Ryder Cup team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jamie Donaldson shot 4-under 68 Sunday to win the Czech Masters and secure a spot on the European Ryder Cup team.

headline.print_headline: Venice Film Fest, Opening This Week, Is Still a Cinema Lifeline
headline.main: Venice Film Fest, Opening This Week, Is Still a Cinema Lifeline

docs.snippet: Saverio Costanzo, the Italian director of the New York City-set low-budget drama "Hungry Hearts" that will compete for the top prize at the Venice Film Festival opening this week, sees the exposure his film will get as a godsend....
docs.lead_paragraph: Saverio Costanzo, the Italian director of the New York City-set low-budget drama "Hungry Hearts" that will compete for the top prize at the Venice Film Festival opening this week, sees the exposure his film will get as a godsend.

headline.print_headline: Taiwan's Wei Family to Buy Cable TV Operator CNS for $2.4 Billion: Source
headline.main: Taiwan's Wei Family to Buy Cable TV Operator CNS for $2.4 Billion: Source

docs.snippet: Taiwan's Wei family has agreed to buy China Network Systems (CNS), the nation's biggest cable TV operator, for about $2.4 billion (1.44 billion pounds) including debt from private equity firm MBK Partners, a person with direct knowledge of the mat...
docs.lead_paragraph: Taiwan's Wei family has agreed to buy China Network Systems (CNS), the nation's biggest cable TV operator, for about $2.4 billion (1.44 billion pounds) including debt from private equity firm MBK Partners, a person with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Sunday.
